name: The alternative evolution of a tadpole
name_original: The alternative evolution of a tadpole
description: The player starts as a small lifeform somewhere in the ocean, a world with various biomes. The player gains points by gathering and consuming smaller lifeforms. After some time without consuming anything, the player will start to loose points. On  death, the player can then invest the points gained into a number of mutations to make collecting points easier.
